name: Escape !
description:
In this 2D platformer, you will have to place blocks and to jump on them to avoid the lava. It took around 80 hours to make this game so I hope you like it !

========== Goal ==============
    Go as high as possible

========== Rules =============
Death
    1. Touching lava kills you
    2. Dropping a shape on your head kills you
    3. Smashing your ribs with a shape kills you

Points
    1. You get points for going higher
    2. You get points for placing shapes
    3. You get points each minute
    4. You get points for completing a row of 25 blocks

========== Controls ==========
The controls are listed in the README file included in the download. The game can be played with a mouse and a keyboard, a keyboard only or an Xbox controller.

Special thanks to

^|Askariot and LazerGunStudios for the tilesets

Music8Bits for the song

If you have any problem launching the game or you want to see the controls, read the README file.
